item.title: Tangro BWF Multiple Vulnerabilties
item.description: Together with Tobias Gy√∂rfi, I tested the software Tangro BWF for a client in 2020. This is a repost of the security advisories that were originally posted on the blog of my former employer Thinking Objects GmbH. Key Value Product Tangro BWF Vendor tangro software components GmbH (Heidelberg, Germany) Tested Version 1.17.5 Fixed Version 1.18.1 Mitigation Update to version >= 1.18.1 Adding Attachments to Arbitrary Workitem Key Value Vulnerability Type Insecure Direct Object Reference CVSSv3 Severity AV:N/AC:L/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N (Score 4.
